channel.title: reflection on Fresh Swift
channel.description: Recent content in reflection on Fresh Swift

item.title: Reflection and Mirror in Swift
item.description: In this post, Vadim Bulavin looks the the Reflective capabilities of Swift. Vadim first describes what Reflection is, before showing us what we can achieve using Swiftâ€™s Mirror type.

item.title: Reflectable Enums
item.description: What does an enum see when it looks in the Mirror? Josh Smiths demonstrates using Swift's Reflection API when working with enums cases which have associated values of varying types.
